name: S Tier (Super Influencers)
description: Profiles with exceptional reach and engagement.

name: B Tier (Active & Growing)
description: Solid profiles with good engagement and growth potential.

name: C Tier (Emerging & Niche)
description: Newer or niche profiles with notable activity within their sphere.

name: D Tier (Standard Users)
description: General users, potentially less active or with smaller followings.
